channel.title: Announcements from Web Services
channel.description: List of announcements for GU-managed WordPress sites.

item.title: Online WordPress training is live!
item.description: To sign up, log into Canvas (if you've taken a Web Services online course previously) or fill out the registration form (if you've never taken one of our online courses).

item.title: Office hours every Tuesday!
item.description: Web Services hosts WordPress-specific office hours every Tuesday, 2:30-3:30pm. Sign up for an appointment slot here (in the Description field, add a few things you want to chat about). Every other week the location will be Car Barn 101, and the other weeks the location will be on Zoom (the appointment slot you sign up for will indicate the location). Weâ€™ll be on hand to chat about migration, accessibility, layouts, or anything else you'd like to discuss regarding your Georgetown WordPress website. See you there!

item.title: Getting help with WordPress
item.description: Getting started with our WordPress platform at Georgetown? Or have a specific question? Take a look at our documentation site for best practices and editing help.

item.title: Report an issue with our WordPress platform!
item.description: Have you encountered an issue while working on your site? Fill out our Google Form and we'll investigate.
